description: What is the name of the doctor?
explanation: Dr. Sam is the chief surgeon in this hospital. He can be identified by his blue scrubs and surgical mask.

persons.name: Dr. SAM
persons.description: Chief surgeon, wears blue scrubs, always in the operating room

persons.name: Nurse SARAH
persons.description: Head nurse, wears pink uniform, usually at the reception desk

description: What does the doctor's note say?
explanation: The note clearly states that the patient needs complete rest for recovery based on their condition.
Warden Robert wears a formal uniform and is always seen in the control room managing operations.

persons.name: Warden ROBERT
persons.description: Prison chief, wears formal uniform, always in the control room

persons.name: Guard MIKE
persons.description: Senior guard, carries keys, patrols the cell blocks

description: What is the name of the guard?
explanation: Guard Mike carries keys and patrols the cell blocks, identifiable by his security badge.
